title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide a phase-in for plasma-derived products under the manufacturer discount program.
committees: House - Energy and Commerce; Ways and Means
latest_action: House - 02/21/2025 Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee... ( All Actions )
status: This bill has the status Introduced
